about_the_game:
A complete artwork collection from the game Casina: A visual novel set in Ancient Greece.
Get the best Artworks (including backgrounds and special scenes) made by our artists at Neoclassic Games in Full HD Resolution, full source quality and without any logos or watermarks.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files.
detailed_description:
A complete artwork collection from the game Casina: A visual novel set in Ancient Greece.
Get the best Artworks (including backgrounds and special scenes) made by our artists at Neoclassic Games in Full HD Resolution, full source quality and without any logos or watermarks.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files.
name: Casina - Artwork Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.5 Ghz
  • Graphics: Display 1280x720
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Processor 1.7 Ghz - AMD Processor 1.7 Ghz
  • Graphics: Display 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Expand your collection with the best original Artworks from the Visual Novel Casina!
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
